title: Scream of the Crocodile
description: A girl exists to do her mother's bidding. Her family, by function of being human, is severely impaired and short-sighted. Their illegal activity is commonplace.One man whose unconventional ways would raise eyebrows in many circles, takes Banty under his tutelage. A newly nourished seedling emerges.Another attempts to exploit and con even his own family for selfish interests.The cycle continues, and it is difficult to tell which animal is the most evolved.
author: Lee Ashe
